title: Bump version to 1.0.0
description:
Prepare the v1.0.0 release.

Steps:
1. Update version in package.json to 1.0.0
2. Final pnpm run lint
3. Final pnpm run test
4. Final pnpm run build
5. Create git tag v1.0.0

DO NOT PUBLISH - wait for explicit user approval
acceptance_criteria: Version bumped and all checks pass
